history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + srun best use: nat_join_left, binary_le_trans. + srun best use: nat_join_right, binary_le_trans. - intros [H1 H2]. hauto use: nat_join_comm, nat_join_mono, nat_join_idem.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros k m n. split. - intros H. split. + rewrite -> nat_meet_right. apply H. + rewrite -> nat_meet_left. apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. rewrite -> nat_meet_right in H1. rewrite -> nat_meet_left in H2. apply H1.
